caption:
Table 3. Ablation study of our learning framework with mul-
tiple model architectures. AEPE in specific regions of the scene 
and the number of CNN parameters are reported. AR: Training 
with augmentation as a regularization framework.

Table 4. Comparison of combinations of transformations. 
AEPE in specific regions are reported. ST: Spatial transformation, 
AT: Appearance transformation, OT: Occlusion transformation.

Table 5. Comparison of our learning framework with direct data 
augmentation and the data distillation framework used in [23, 24].

Table 6. Comparison of different augmentation transformations 
integrated with our framework. AT: appearance transformation, 
ST: spatial transformation. 

evaluate the same transformations with different usages.
Table 7. Generalization performance of cross datasets evaluation.
